skills: Programming & Interactive Media: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, C#, Arduino Uno, Unity
Design & Visual Communication: Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects, Premiere Pro, Lightroom Classic
Creative Practice: Photography, Visual Storytelling, Motion Graphics
interests: Technology as a medium for connection, speculation, and interaction
Art as emotional language and cultural reflection
Games as playful, interactive systems for storytelling
Photography as a way of documenting memory, rhythm, and atmosphere
Printmaking as a tactile counterpoint to the digital, embracing process and imperfection
about.introduction: Xuanke is a New York–based artist and designer working across interactive media, game design, web environments, printmaking, and photography. Her work explores how technology shapes human perception, emotion, and agency, creating experiences that merge digital systems with material sensibility. Through playful interaction and experimental interfaces, she investigates how we navigate connection and meaning in a world increasingly mediated by screens.

Interactive Design.title: DeCade
Interactive Design.shortDescription: DeCade is an interactive installation that turns the act of plugging and unplugging into both mechanism and metaphor, evoking the dreamlike aesthetics of fading arcades and fragile memory. A 7×7 grid of sockets becomes a surreal matrix—not filled with machines, but with their lingering characters. Each connection triggers a response, pulling the player deeper into a nostalgic loop that refuses closure.

Interactive Design.title: Blind Faith
Interactive Design.shortDescription: Blind Faith invites participants to draw an action, perform it, and receive an “answer” in return. By turning uncertainty, performance, and reward into a ritual, Blind Faith reflects how consumer culture elevates ordinary objects into icons of desire, value, and belief.

Interactive Design.title: Ripple
Interactive Design.shortDescription: A fun app that helps people save water by turning their daily progress into rewards, fish care, and community boss battles.

Interactive Design.title: Quest
Interactive Design.shortDescription: A pixel game set in a divided universe where the player collects badges and script fragments to resolve a conflict between two forces.

Interactive Design.title: Unboxing Data
Interactive Design.shortDescription: Unboxing Data is a conceptual digital project that unpacks data trails and digital identities across scales — from personal to global — inviting users to reflect on how mediated information shapes experience, identity, and perception.

Photography.title: The Scent
Photography.shortDescription: An exploration of commercial photography techniques using multiple lightning tools and controlled studio methods.

Photography.title: Crimson
Photography.shortDescription: Light becomes language here- constructing, erasing, and redefining.

Printmaking.title: F-R-O-G
Printmaking.shortDescription: Relief print where the word “frog” is shaped into the form of the animal itself, merging typography and imagery into a single visual structure.

Printmaking.title: “Fssst”
Printmaking.shortDescription: Press print exploring the relationship between sound, text, and image by translating the onomatopoeic “Fssst” into a tactile visual form.

Public Art.title: Public Installation
Public Art.shortDescription: An 8,000-square-foot mural led by Yuehan (Selina) Ma, exploring the movement and autonomy of water through flowing organic forms and abstract natural patterns.

Sculpture.title: The Structure
Sculpture.shortDescription: A modular paper sculpture constructed entirely through interlocking pieces without glue.

Sculpture.title: Low-poly Human Head
Sculpture.shortDescription: A hand-built low-poly sculpture inspired by Jaume Plensa’s Water’s Soul, exploring form, scale, and materiality through meticulous paper construction and precise folding techniques.

Uncategorized.title: Terra Lucida
Uncategorized.shortDescription: A research-driven project investigating climate-induced displacement and the absence of refugee recognition.

workExperience.company: Fujian Shen Shao’an Lacquer Art Museum

workExperience.company: Beijing Moxiaotuo Model Kou Cultural Technology Co., Ltd
responsibilities: Got acquainted with cultural and creative products related to Chinese traditional culture.
Immersed in lifestyle products and cultural space experiences involving tea culture, historical culture, and utensil aesthetics.
Engaged in product selection and planning by mining Chinese traditional cultural elements and translating abstract cultural images into product concepts aligned with modern aesthetics.
Worked on product positioning, including packaging style decisions and presentation strategy.
Participated in seal collection and design, interactive experience design and equipment installation, as well as visual material and graphic design.
